sections.heading: GIVING IN PAYMENT; PROCEDUREArt
sections.text: 3295. Giving in payment of succession propertyThe executor or administrator may transfer by a giving in payment any succession property in satisfaction of secured or unsecured debts. The property may be taken in indivision by the secured or unsecured creditors, or bo
